All about me

Hi! I like code… 

My skills

  • Html (Haml)
  • CSS (Scss with compass)
  • Javascript (Jquery)
  • PHP
  • CMS - Wordpress, Magento
  • Plays with APIs - World Bank/Twitter/Police

  1. IT Admistrator

    March 2013 – Present

    The Hireman (London) Ltd

    • Help desk responsibility – general support for users within the company.
    • Server management – Win 2003, 2008R2 + a Linux intranet server.
    • Active Directory.
    • Project work – planning hardware upgrades and expanding the functionality/design of the website.
    • Magento administration.
    • Large amount of admin experience with Syrinx & Sage.
    • Desktop repair & fault finding.
    • Advising and purchasing of new IT equipment.
    • Worked extensively on planning and implementing an SEO strategy.
    • Extensive Google Adwords Experience.
    • Extensive Google Analytics knowledge – measuring SEO impact and other important metrics.

  2. Junior Project Manager

    April 2012 – June 2012 (3 months)

    The Web Kitchen

    • Day to day maintenance of websites (html, css, php, javascript).
    • Dealing with requests of clients efficiently and building up a good reputation.
    • Brainstorming new ideas and working on designs.
    • SEO was a major part of this internship.
    • Advising on new technologies and methods for new ventures.
    • Solving server issues.

  3. Graduate

    Sept 2010 – 2013

    University of West London

    • B.A. (Hons) in Web Design
    • Finished with a 2:1

  4. Repairs/Sales

    December 2005 – September 2010

    C&E Computer Consumables

    • Building and repairing computers to firm deadlines.
    • Day to day computer hardware sales and advice.
    • Customer interaction through direct contact, phone and email.
    • Also dealing with stock, interacting with suppliers.

Other Stuff I’ve done

  • Attended a Guardian Masterclass on Data Visualisation
